IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.update_equip_item_enchant_skill') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.update_equip_item_enchant_skill GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.update_equip_item_enchant_skill @item_id dbo.id_t, @slot_index SMALLINT, @skill_code dbo.code_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
IF @slot_index = 0 BEGIN UPDATE dbo.EquipItemInfos SET socket_skill_code_1 = @skill_code WHERE inventory_id = @item_id END ELSE IF @slot_index = 1 BEGIN UPDATE dbo.EquipItemInfos SET socket_skill_code_2 = @skill_code WHERE inventory_id = @item_id END ELSE IF @slot_index = 2 BEGIN UPDATE dbo.EquipItemInfos SET socket_skill_code_3 = @skill_code WHERE inventory_id = @item_id END ELSE IF @slot_index = 3 BEGIN UPDATE dbo.EquipItemInfos SET socket_skill_code_4 = @skill_code WHERE inventory_id = @item_id END ELSE IF @slot_index = 4 BEGIN UPDATE dbo.EquipItemInfos SET socket_skill_code_5 = @skill_code WHERE inventory_id = @item_id END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
